Package com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.meshes

Class Face

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.meshes.Face
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Integer>
    public class Face
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Integer>
    A class that represents a single face in the mesh. The face is a polygon. Its minimum count of vertices is = 3.
    Author:
    Marcin Roguski (Kaelthas)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Face.TriangulationWarning
      A warning that indicates a problem with face triangulation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Face

        public Face​(java.lang.Integer[] indexes,
            boolean smooth,
            int materialNumber,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<com.jme.math.Vector2f>> faceUVCoords,
            java.util.List<byte[]> vertexColors,
            TemporalMesh temporalMesh)
        Creates a complete face with all available data.
        Parameters:
        indexes - the indexes of the face (required)
        smooth - indicates if the face is smooth or solid
        materialNumber - the material index of the face
        faceUVCoords - UV coordinate sets of the face (optional)
        vertexColors - the vertex colors of the face (optional)
        temporalMesh - the temporal mesh the face belongs to (required)

      • setTemporalMesh

        public void setTemporalMesh​(TemporalMesh temporalMesh)
        Sets the temporal mesh for the face. The given mesh cannot be null.
        Parameters:
        temporalMesh - the temporal mesh of the face
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if given temporal mesh is null

      • loadAll

        public static java.util.List<Face> loadAll​(Structure meshStructure,
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<com.jme.math.Vector2f>> userUVGroups,
                                           java.util.List<byte[]> verticesColors,
                                           TemporalMesh temporalMesh,
                                           BlenderContext blenderContext)
                                    throws BlenderFileException
        Loads all faces of a given mesh.
        Parameters:
        meshStructure - the mesh structure we read the faces from
        userUVGroups - UV groups defined by the user
        verticesColors - the vertices colors of the mesh
        temporalMesh - the temporal mesh the faces will belong to
        blenderContext - the blender context
        Returns:
        list of faces read from the given mesh structure
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - an exception is thrown when problems with file reading occur
